what: World Vector Map Data from Natural Earth Used in rnaturalearth
title: World Vector Map Data from Natural Earth Used in rnaturalearth
text: R package store data rnaturalearth package. Data rnaturalearth packages : rnaturalearth : one low resolution example file & data can downloaded NaturalEarth using ne_download() rnaturalearthdata : low (scale 110) medium resolution (scale 50) files rnaturalearthhires : high resolution (scale 10) files

title: rnaturalearthdata 1.0.0
text: CRAN release: 2024-02-09

title: rnaturalearthdata 1.0.0
text: release introduces breaking changes discontinuing support sp object favor sf. Although sp object still available CRAN, longer actively developed (https://geocompx.org/post/2023/rgdal-retirement/). main reason prompted decision transition sf. list affected objects now returned Spatial Feature (sf): changing return type sf causes many issues existing code, can still convert back sp. information retirement rgdal, rgeos maptools: https://r-spatial.org/r/2022/04/12/evolution.html

title: rnaturalearthdata 0.2.1 2023-03-06
text: update data Natural Earth v5.1.2. add github action automate data updates

title: rnaturalearthdata 0.2.0
